TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit CurrencyWrapper extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Wraps objects the marshaler should marshal as a `VT_CY`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Controls how the wrapped object is marshaled when passed as a Variant. Wrap a `Decimal` in a `CurrencyWrapper` to have it marshaled as a `VT_CY`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Decimal obj) cil managed

Docs.param: The `Decimal` to be wrapped and marshaled as `VT_CY`.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CurrencyWrapper"> class with the `Decimal` to be wrapped and marshaled as type `VT_CY`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object obj) cil managed

Docs.param: The object containing the `Decimal` to be wrapped and marshaled as `VT_CY`.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CurrencyWrapper"> class with the object containing the `Decimal` to be wrapped and marshaled as type `VT_CY`.
Gets the wrapped object to be marshaled as type `VT_CY`.
Docs.value: The wrapped object to be marshaled as type `VT_CY`.
